data.oai_dc:dc: OCEANET-ATMOSPHERE PollyXT measurements during POLARSTERN cruise PS106

The dataset contains daily nc-files of the attenuated backscatter coefficient and volume depolarization from the OCEANET multiwavelength Raman and polarization lidar PollyXT (Engelmann et al., 2016, doi:10.5194/amt-9-1767-2016, Baars et al., 2017, doi:10.5194/amt-10-3175-2017) during Polarstern cruise PS106. The data is calibrated within the Cloudnet (Illingworth, 2007 doi:10.1175/BAMS-88-6-883) processing scheme.
